Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

11
Aug 2020

"Maen nhw'n ffigurau trawiadol ac mae'r broblem ar gynnydd" @siangwenfelin

60% o bobol leol methu fforddio tai lleol

40% o dai lleol wedi'u rhestru fel ail gartrefi

Sut mae gwneud denu ymwelwyr yn brofiad positif i bawb? Gwrandewch isod #DrosGinio https://t.co/8BXn2KXPy2

— Radio Cymru (@BBCRadioCymru) August 10, 2020

Maen nhw’n ffigurau trawiadol - ‘Maen nhw’ means ‘they are’. This is the present tense, third person plural form of ‘bod’(to be) used in affirmative sentences.

methu fforddio - can’t afford

denu ymwelwyr - attract visitors

please let me know of any corrections

"They are striking figures and it's a growing problem" @siangwenfelin 60% of local people cannot afford local houses. 40% of local houses have been listed as second homes. How do we make attracting visitors a positive experience for everyone? Listen below.

10
Aug 2020

Mae criw y Tour de Llyn ac Eifionydd wedi cyrraedd Enlli erbyn hyn, ond ydyn nhw'n dechrau fflagio...? Diolch i chi am fynd ati i godi arian at #steddfod2022 mewn ffordd mor egnïol! Dyma'r ddolen i gefnogi - https://t.co/o37B3RCTe6 pic.twitter.com/0pYYm9coEB

— eisteddfod (@eisteddfod) August 8, 2020

ydyn nhw’n dechrau fflagio? - this sentence uses the question form of the present tense of ‘bod’(to be). In this case, ‘ydyn nhw’ is the third person plural and means ‘are they?’

mynd ati i (verbnoun) - to go about …ing

erbyn hyn - in this context means ‘now’, to indicate that the riders are ‘now’ at Enlli.

please let me know of any corrections

The Tour de Llyn and Eifionydd crew have now arrived at Enlli, but are they starting to flag...? Thank you for raising money for #steddfod2022 in such an energetic way! Here is the link to support.

09
Aug 2020

“Y nod yn y pen draw i Ridiculously Rich yw dosbarthu ein teisennau i gymaint o siopau a chwsmeriaid ag sy'n bosib!” Darllenwch yr hanes o sut mae @Alana_Spencer_ wedi parhau i gael llwyddiant efo’i busnes ar ol ennill ‘The Apprentice’ yn 2016. https://t.co/ffD7YF2J5B pic.twitter.com/YpowA24sqk

— Busnes Cymru (@_busnescymru) August 6, 2020

y nod yn y pen draw - the ultimate aim

cymaint - as many

llwyddiant - success

"The ultimate aim for Ridiculously Rich is to distribute our cakes to as many shops and customers as possible!" Read the story of how @Alana_Spencer_ continued to have success with her business after winning 'The Apprentice' in 2016.

08
Aug 2020

Dewch i weithio gyda ni

Rydym yn chwilio am Swyddog Cyllid a Gweinyddiaeth i ymuno â'n tîm Tyfu'r Dyfodol 🧑‍💻

Dyma swydd lawn-amser sy’n dechrau ar y dyddiad cynharaf y gellir ei drefnu

Oes gennych chi ddiddordeb? Darganfod mwy o wybodaeth ar ein gwefan https://t.co/87vpVDd2Lg pic.twitter.com/bXDd5OKKuB

— Garden Of Wales 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 Gardd Cymru (@walesbotanic) August 7, 2020

swyddog - officer

gweinyddiaeth - administration

lawn-amser - full-time

Come work with us. We are looking for a Finance and Administration Officer to join our 'Growing the Future' team. This is a full-time job starting on the soonest date that can be arranged. Are you interested? Find more information on our website.

Aug 2020

Awydd gwyliau milltir sgwâr funud olaf? Ystafelloedd gwely a brecwast cyfforddus efo golygfeydd o’r môr a mynyddoedd ar gael penwythnos yma! Dewch i'r Nant i ymlacio! Cysylltwch am fanylion.#lleol #milltirsgwar #yagym pic.twitter.com/lnMl4YGSsN

— Nant Gwrtheyrn (@NantGwrtheyrn1) August 5, 2020

munud-olaf - last minute

cyfforddus - comfortable

golygfeydd - views

Fancy a last-minute, local holiday? Comfortable bed and breakfast rooms with views of the beach and mountains available this weekend! Come to the Nant to relax. Contact for details.
